<@UGJ3XBBGF> I don’t think it is controlled with the hover pseudo, I think that JS is adding a class to the parent container and the styles are attached to that. It’s possible that it’s just adding the styles inline on those elements.

If you want to override this you’ll have to overwrite the class styles or if they’re inline, use a lot of gross !importants. You may have an easier time just adding the menu into a custom module so you don’t have to detune it.
